buy(string,uint256,address,address).details: Buy insurance for a flight passengers purchase insurance prior to flight

creditInsurees(string,uint256,address).details: Credits refund payouts to insurees If flight is delayed due to airline fault, passengers are paid 1.5X the amount they paid for the insurance

fund(address).details: Initial funding for the insurance. Unless there are too many delayed flights     resulting in insurance refunds, the contract should be self-sustaining

isOperational().return: A bool that is the current operating status
